content: अपेहि (Imper. 2nd <ab>sing.</ab>). Used as the first member of some compounds (belonging to the class मयूरव्यंसकादि <ls>P. II. 1. 72</ls>); °करा, °द्वितीया, °प्रकसा, °वाणिजा, °स्वागता where it has the sense of ‘excluding,’ ‘expelling’, ‘refusing admission to’; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} °वाणिजा a ceremony where merchants are excluded; so °द्वितीया &c.
